channel.title: [Application] Shop maker
channel.description:
Hello everyone!
First of all, this is not leeched I had the source code and did some updating
I thought this could help out the community because it is very light weight and makes it easier create spawn codes.
[img]http://img254.imageshack.us/img254/6910/pic1mx.png[/img]
[img]http://img337.imageshack.us/img337/8251/pic1hs.png[/img]
[img]http://img51.imageshack.us/img51/8761/pic1fxd.png[/img]
[img]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/6596/scanbvo.png[/img]
I am open to all comments, suggestions!
Please let me know if you find a bug in the program AND/OR if you have a suggestion that will make the application better for everyone!
You may share this with your friends and others. Please just give me some credit
Once again the link is here: http://www.mediafire.com/?sy16mm1v6y5uvd5 V2!: http://www.mediafire.com/?v188fqiqefqanrs
Thank you for your time and for your help!

item.title: [Application] Shop maker
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

Slightly pointless, since there are so many around.
Good Job though.

Pro Tip(s): Make it so the user can type in the NPC’s name too. (i.e. ‘Man’ instead of 1 or 2).
Also make it accumulative, so the user can do like 400 NPC’s at once, and copy it at the end.
And boxes/inputs for X,Y locations too…

Read full topic

Thanks for contributing though!
